segments.text: Hi , Sven , can you help me ? Could you hold the end of the tape measure , please ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Of course , where do you want me to stand ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Just there by the door . I need to measure the length of this workbench . We're going to replace it . OK - 3 m 47 cm . Let's round it up to 3 m 50 .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm glad you're replacing it . We need more space to work on things . How deep will the new workbench be ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Tell me what size you want and I'll order the wood .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , it's about 65 cm at the moment . Could we increase it by about a third ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sure . So let's see . We need a piece of wood 3.5 m long by 1 m wide . I'll order it right away and I'll be able to install it next Tuesday .
segments.speaker: S1
